MPI_Finalize

Terminate the MPI execution environment.

Syntax

MPI_Finalize()
r = MPI_Finalize()

Output argument

r

a logical.

Description

Terminate the MPI execution environment.

MPI process are launched in CLI mode (no gui, no plot).

See also

MPI_Initialized, MPI_Init.

Example

if ~MPI_Initialized()
  MPI_Init();
end
if MPI_Initialized()
  MPI_Finalize();
end

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
